home_h3_9: Get professional mortgage consulting from the comfort of your home - in pajamas, with coffee, at a time that suits you
home_p_29: In today's complex financial world, getting professional mortgage consulting is not just an advantage - it's a necessity. We at Ariel Achon Mortgage and Financial Consulting - Mortgage in Pajamas understand that purchasing property or refinancing a mortgage are among the most significant financial steps in your life. That's why we offer comprehensive mortgage consulting tailored to your specific needs.
home_p_30: With extensive experience in the financial field and deep familiarity with the Israeli market, we provide professional and reliable service that saves you considerable time and money. Our goal is to ensure you get the best possible terms for your mortgage.
home_p_31:
Our motto "Mortgage in Pajamas" symbolizes our unique approach to service. We understand that your life is busy - work, family, commitments. So we come to you or through video calls - at a time that's convenient for you, in a place that's convenient for you. Want to get consulting in the evening after the kids have gone to sleep? No problem. Prefer a weekend meeting? Gladly. You don't need to leave your home.
Even if you're in pajamas - that's perfectly fine! Our service is built on maximum convenience, high availability, and a homely feeling that makes you feel relaxed and confident throughout the entire process.
home_p_32: Starting your journey toward your first home? We provide comprehensive first home mortgage consulting that accompanies you at every stage. We'll explain all the options, help you understand your rights, and find the most suitable mortgage for your budget and needs.
home_p_33:
Won the lottery in the project framework? Congratulations!
We'll help you navigate this exciting journey, so you can choose the most suitable apartment for you, and we'll accompany you until you get the right, suitable, and cheapest mortgage.
home_p_34: Already have a mortgage? You might be able to save thousands of shekels per year! We specialize in mortgage refinancing and terms improvement, examining your existing mortgage and negotiating with banks to improve terms. Our service includes a comprehensive review of all savings opportunities.
home_p_35: Planning to move to a larger apartment? We provide mortgage consulting for housing upgraders that takes into account your existing mortgage and finds the optimal solution for the move. We'll help you understand the different options and find the most cost-effective path for you.
home_p_36:
Found yourself in a situation where the loans and commitments taken are making things difficult for you? Running out of money at the beginning of the month? Have debts that keep you awake at night?
We'll help you get a mortgage for loan consolidation and debt relief.
home_p_38: We conduct interest rate bidding among all banks and financial institutions in Israel, ensuring you get the best possible terms. The savings you'll receive can reach tens of thousands of shekels over the mortgage period.
home_p_39: Each client receives personalized mortgage consulting that takes into account their unique financial situation, future plans, and special needs. We believe there's no one-size-fits-all solution.
home_p_40: From the first meeting until signing the mortgage and beyond - we're here for you. We'll accompany you at every stage, answer every question, and ensure you feel confident and informed throughout the entire process.
home_p_41: Instead of approaching each bank separately and dealing with complicated bureaucracy, we do the hard work for you. We'll take care of all the small details and save you precious time and considerable effort.
home_p_42: With the "Mortgage in Pajamas" approach, you get service from home - at a time convenient for you, without needing to travel or dress up. Real convenience that saves you time and effort.
home_p_43: Young couples or singles aged 25-35 planning to purchase their first apartment and needing professional guidance on first home mortgage consulting. We'll help you understand all the options and rights available to you.
home_p_44: People aged 35-50 with financial experience interested in real estate investments. We'll provide professional mortgage consulting that will help you maximize return on investment and improve your existing mortgage terms.
home_p_45: Families aged 30-45 with children interested in moving to a larger apartment. We'll help you find the best mortgage solution that will allow you to upgrade your housing without compromising your financial stability.
home_p_46: Managing family finances is a complex challenge. We provide comprehensive financial consulting that helps you manage your family budget wisely, plan for the future, and achieve long-term financial stability.
home_p_47: Your pension and insurance portfolio is one of your most important assets. We examine your existing pension portfolio, identify improvement opportunities, and provide professional recommendations for maximizing returns.
home_p_48: Need a loan for a special purpose? We assist in finding personal loans on the best terms, whether for renovation, business investment, or any other financial need.
home_p_49: Business owners need special financial solutions. We provide mortgage consulting and financial consulting for business clients, including financing for commercial property purchases and business loans.

We believe that with our knowledge, experience and professionalism, we can help every client find the perfect mortgage for them.
about_p_27: Over the years, we have guided hundreds of families and individuals through the home buying process, mortgage refinancing and financial terms improvement. Our clients' success is our success, and the warm recommendations we receive from them are our greatest reward.
about_p_28: Our mission is simple yet important: to provide professional, personal and reliable mortgage consulting that helps our clients get the best possible terms. We strive to make the complex process of obtaining a mortgage as simple, transparent and pleasant as possible.
about_p_29: We are committed to working with complete dedication for every client, regardless of the mortgage size or case complexity. Every client receives our full attention and professionalism, and we do everything to ensure their financial success.
about_p_30: Our vision is to be the leaders in the mortgage consulting field in Israel, and to be the first address that comes to mind when people think about mortgages. services_h1_1: Comprehensive mortgage consulting services tailored to your needs
services_h2_8: Interested in one of our services?
services_h3_9: From first home to mortgage refinancing - we're here for you at every step
services_p_17: Buying your first home is one of the most significant and exciting steps in life. We understand that the process can seem complex and intimidating, which is why we offer comprehensive first home mortgage consulting that accompanies you from start to finish.
services_p_18: Our service includes a detailed explanation of all available mortgage types, checking your eligibility for mortgages and government benefits, and managing interest rate tenders between different banks. We'll help you understand all required documents and accompany you to every bank meeting.
services_p_19: As part of our mortgage consulting, we'll build a detailed financial plan for you that shows exactly how much you can afford, what the expected monthly payment will be, and how the mortgage will affect your financial situation over the years. Our goal is to ensure you start life in your new home with peace of mind and financial security.
services_p_20: If you already have a mortgage, you might be paying too much! The mortgage market is constantly changing, and interest rates that were competitive a few years ago may be too high today. Mortgage refinancing and terms improvement can save you thousands of shekels per year.
services_p_21: We specialize in comprehensive review of your existing mortgage and identifying savings opportunities. We'll examine the interest rate you're currently paying, your mortgage terms, and various improvement options. Then, we'll approach all relevant banks and financial institutions and find the best offer for you.
services_p_22: The mortgage refinancing process also includes checking upfront fees, calculating expected long-term savings, and ensuring the switch is truly worthwhile. We'll handle all the small details and ensure the process goes smoothly without unpleasant surprises. Our mortgage consulting guarantees you'll receive the best possible terms.
services_p_23: Has your family grown and it's time to move to a larger home? Housing improvement is a significant step that requires careful financial planning. We provide mortgage consulting for housing upgraders that takes into account your existing mortgage and finds the optimal solution for the transition.
services_p_24: As part of our mortgage consulting, we'll examine your current mortgage, assess the value of your existing property, and explore various options for financing the new apartment. Should you sell your current apartment first? Is it better to keep it and rent it out? We'll help you make the right decision based on your financial situation and goals.
services_p_25: We'll also coordinate between selling the old property and purchasing the new one, check bridge mortgage options if needed, and ensure the transition occurs smoothly without excessive financial stress. Our goal is to help you upgrade your housing while maintaining financial stability and minimizing risks.
services_p_26: Every person is unique, and so are their financial needs. We believe there's no one-size-fits-all solution, which is why we offer precise and personalized mortgage matching services. We'll build a mortgage that fits exactly your needs, financial situation, and future plans.
services_p_27: The process begins with an in-depth consultation where we learn about your financial situation, income and expenses, future plans, and financial goals. Based on this information, we build a personalized mortgage plan that takes into account all relevant parameters.
services_p_28: We examine different types of mortgages - fixed-rate, variable, or combined mortgages, index-linked or non-linked mortgages, and more. We'll explain the advantages and disadvantages of each option and recommend the optimal combination for you. Our mortgage consulting ensures you receive a solution that fits you exactly.
services_p_29: Proper management of family finances is the key to financial stability and achieving long-term financial goals. We offer comprehensive financial consulting that helps you manage your family budget smartly and efficiently.
services_p_30: We'll start by building a complete picture of your financial situation - income, fixed and variable expenses, debts and financial obligations. We'll identify savings opportunities and build a customized budget plan that will help you achieve your financial goals.
services_p_31: The service also includes consulting on topics such as long-term savings, building an emergency fund, retirement planning, and more. We'll help you understand where your money goes and how to manage it better. The goal is to give you complete control over your finances and ensure a secure financial future for your family.
services_p_32: Your pension portfolio is one of your most important assets and will significantly impact your quality of life in retirement. Despite this, many of us don't know what's in our pension portfolio or whether it's managed optimally.
services_p_33: We offer a comprehensive examination service for your pension portfolio. We'll check the funds and tracks you're investing in, examine their performance over time, and compare them to market alternatives. We'll also check the fees you're paying and ensure they're reasonable.
services_p_34: Based on our examination, we'll provide professional recommendations for improving your pension portfolio. This may include transferring to better-performing funds, changing investment tracks, reducing fees, and more. The goal is to maximize returns on your pension savings and ensure a comfortable and dignified retirement.
services_p_35: Contact us today for a free initial consultation. We'll be happy to answer any questions and help you find the perfect financial solution for you.
